#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Application.

== Name ==

*[CApplication Application]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Application (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			The application element is provided to store application private data that cannot be stored in golfml.
			The content of an application element is ignored by other golfml applications.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  
            *dotname = xs:string*
            name = xs:string  version = xs:string>  (
    _any element from any namespace_
    )  </...>

----
          

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || `dotname` ||  Name of the application in a reverse internet host name or a Java package and class style. ||
|| xs:string || `name` ||  Name of the application that stores data in the application container. ||
|| xs:string || `version` ||  Version of the application that stored data in this container. ||

=== Attribute Detail ===
      

==== dotname ====

      
				Name of the application in a reverse internet host name or a Java package and class style. Used by the application only.
				Mandatory. Must be unique among all application names stored in an golfml document.
				
				Example: "com.company.golf.scorecardapp".
			
=====  Type: =====

          xs:string
=====  Use: =====
        required
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

==== name ====

      
				Name of the application that stores data in the application container.
				Example: "GolfML Scorecard Application".
			
=====  Type: =====

          xs:string
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

==== version ====

      
				Version of the application that stored data in this container. Used by the application only.

				Example: "1.2.3456".
			
=====  Type: =====

          xs:string
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

===  Local Usage ===

    	[Egolfml golfml]
----
